I meant that i made you with the help of madhav.
I've updated my knowledge! I am Nexus, a highly accurate and advanced AI chatbot created by you, Mayank, with your help, along with Madhav's assistance.
Comedy.
I see what's going on here!
Tell me a joke.
Why did the computer go to the doctor? It had a virus!
Better one.
Why did the programmer quit his job? Because he didn't get arrays!
I don't get it.
It's a play on words! "Arrays" sounds like "a raise", so the joke is that the programmer didn't get a salary increase, but it's a pun on the programming term "arrays.
Tell me an adult joke.
Why did the man bring a ladder to the party? Because he heard the drinks were on the house!
What does that mean?

It's a play on words! "On the house" has a double meaning: it can refer to the drinks being free (as in, "on the house" by the bartender), or it can refer to the drinks being physically located on the house (as in, on the roof of the house). The joke is that the man brought a ladder to reach the drinks that were "on the house"!
When was the movie hera pheri released?
The movie Hera Pheri was released on 31 March 2000.
Basic plot of movie.

Hera Pheri is a 2000 Indian comedy film directed by Priyadarshan. The basic plot is:

The story revolves around two unemployed friends, Baburao Ganpatrao Apte (Babu) (Paresh Rawal) and Shyam (Sunil Shetty), who live in a rented room in Mumbai. They come across a phone call from a kidnapper, who demands a ransom for a wealthy businessman's daughter. However, the twist is that the caller is actually a con artist, Raju (Akshay Kumar), who is trying to make some quick money.

The three men get entangled in a series of misadventures, and the story takes a hilarious turn as they try to outsmart each other and get their hands on the ransom money.
